ygData.subject: RE: just wondering
ygData.msgSnippet: ... One other thing, you may want ... LOL  yes it helps  alot  thank you m lord **curtseys b4 you**  heh  and as far as the title goes  i don t see the problem
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "David Burger" <david.burger@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] just wondering
>Date: Wed, 11 Aug 1999 07:43:59 -0700
>
>From: "David Burger" <david.burger@...>
>
>Anne,
>
>From my understanding here are the issues:
>
One other thing, you may want
>to make a more descriptive title to your thread. Something like 'List
>Etiquette' would be appropriate. I would change it now but it will screw
>with people who are deleting this thread with a filter.
>
>Hope this helps.
>
LOL yes it helps alot thank you m'lord **curtseys b4 you** heh and as
far as the title goes i don't see the problem with putting the title the
way i did LOL i am just wondering heh thanx again
>--------------------------------------------------------------------
>David Burger
>david.burger@...
>http://www.deadbbs.com/~burger/
>
>Reality is whatever refuses to go away when I stop believing in it.
> - Philip K. Dick
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Anne Falbo-Ortiz [mailto:topaaz_ladyjay@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, August 11, 1999 7:24 AM
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com; EQ-Druids@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] just wondering
>
>
>From: "Anne Falbo-Ortiz" <topaaz_ladyjay@...>
>
>ok i have a question, when i first joined this list i was told not to just
>simply reply to a message, that i must first delete the thread. Since then
>i have done as asked, but alot of ppl are replying to messages without
>deleting the threads, while i understand the reason, NOW, for deleting the
>thread,i do not understand why others don't delete as well? i am a little
>miffed about this as it was not asked nicely of me, well maybe i took it
>wrong, but just the same, if i have to delete the threads then why does
>everyone else not have to. Also i was adding color to the message as i
>thought it looked better and was told not to do that as well!! oh well i
>was just wondering why i was told to do so and since then i have seen many
>long messages by others. err ppl i am not slamming anyone i am just asking
>a general question -- thanx for yer time -- anne *hugs*
>
